name: SEA SIREN Button Necklace Set
description:
"Sea Siren" Black Ocean Pearl Button Necklace Set



Do you hear the Sirens singing, so hauntingly beautiful their song,
blows above the seas foam such as to draw you near, nearer.......




This Sea Siren button necklace set is in three, like the Sirens of ancient myth. They are made with hundreds of beautiful black Ocean Pearl, or abalone Mother of Pearl buttons.
These are never used, vintage old stock buttons that date to the early to mid 1900's. These
lovely shell buttons are really not truly black at all but a deep grey and radiate beautiful rich colors of pink, blue, gold and purple
and all colors in between, different depending on angle, light and what you are wearing.
The iridescence of these buttons is truly incredible,
so beautiful and nearly impossible to photograph, but I did my best.

You may wear this set as is or in singles if you prefer depending on the look you want. Dramatic or more conservative.

The measurements below are of the complete loop for each as it encircles your neck. My photo shows how it will hang approximately on a body.

Shortest to longest necklace:

* 27 inches ( 68.58 cm )

* 31 inches ( 78.74 cm )

* 37 inches ( 93.98 cm )

The width of the buttons is approximately 1/2 inch ( 1 cm ) and the buttons vary
slightly from this measurement due to non uniformity of these old buttons.


Your button necklace will come to you carefully wrapped and packaged in a handmade fabric pouch closed
with a vintage or antique button.




Lovely as a Mermaiden she be......





Handmade by Julia



© Copyright 2008, Julia Creighton, All Rights Reserved




Thank you from StelmaDesigns!

name: Black Snap Necklace
description:
Black Snap Necklace, Industrial Necklace of Enameled Metal



This is the second necklace in my newest collection and a completely original design using hundreds of black enameled brass snap fasteners. I have another necklace of snaps in my shop but these are even teenier and thus much more tedious to string. I love how they look at first like an unusual chain, but upon closer inspection, you can see they are snaps! This necklace is light and easy to wear as one long length or doubled for two shorter strands. This would also look lovely mixed with my button strands.



Measured along the entire longest loop.

45 inches long (114.30 cm )
Snaps slightly under 1/4 inch in width. ( 0.64 cm )



Your necklace will come to you carefully wrapped and packaged in a handmade fabric pouch fastened with a vintage or antique button.




Handmade by Julia Creighton

© Copyright 2009


Thank you from StelmaDesigns

name: Antique Button Necklace, REEF
description:
Antique Button Necklace, Reef, Mother of Pearl Shell and Abalone


This gorgeous, one of a kind necklace is fashioned of many layered antique and vintage mother of pearl and abalone shell buttons, most of which have been used previous and show a beautiful patina of age.  Some are new looking and bright and some have a beautiful subtle older look as does a shell tossed about in the sea tide.   

These shell buttons shine in all the colors of the rainbow depending on the light and cast iridescent glow about your neck.  This is a one of a kind piece and even if I make another similar, no two would ever be alike.




Measured along the entire longest loop.

40 inches long  (101.60 cm )
Buttons vary from 3/8 inch to 1 - 1/8 inch in width.  (.95 -  2.86 cm )



Your necklace will come to you carefully wrapped and packaged in a handmade fabric pouch fastened
with a vintage or antique button.




Handmade by Julia Creighton

© Copyright 2013



Thank you from StelmaDesigns!

name: Vintage Button Necklace, CINDERELLA
description:
Vintage Button Necklace, CINDERELLA, Clear Cut Plastic Carved Buttons, Dramatically Long, Statement Piece


The story of Cinderella is very, very old, published by Charles Perrault in 1697 and then at a later date in the Brothers Grimm collection of Grimms Fairy Tales. If a modern Cinderella were to wear a necklace to go with her clear glass slippers, it would be this one.

This button necklace is fashioned of hundreds of varied sized, vintage, clear, carved, plastic buttons. Each button is a tiny treasure, cut in intricate designs that look like cut glass, ornate and some simple. The contrast between the chunky larger buttons and small ones give interest and a sculptural quality that I love. Even the color varies from pure silvery clear to a slightly aged, pale, straw yellow in some of the buttons. This is a very long dramatic statement piece that you can wear doubled or long like my flapper length designs. This is a one of a kind piece and even if I ever get enough to make another, it will be a limited edition and still no two would ever be alike.




Measured along the entire longest loop.

52 inches long (132.08 cm )
Buttons vary from 3/8 inch to 7/8 inch in width. (.95 - 2.22 cm )



Your necklace will come to you carefully wrapped and packaged in a handmade fabric pouch fastened
with a vintage or antique button.




Handmade by Julia Creighton

© Copyright 2013

name: Vintage Button Necklace, TIDDLY WINK
description:
Vintage Button Necklace, Tiddly Wink, Mod Plastic Statement Necklace, Long Dramatic


This is a lighthearted playful necklace inspired by the vintage game pieces in "Tiddly Winks, The Game".  

This vintage button necklace is fashioned of hundreds of varied sized, vintage, clear, red, blue and yellow flat plastic buttons.  The buttons date from the 60s to 70s and some of the yellow ones could be apple juice buttons, but I am not sure.  I love how this looks strung on a red silky cord.   This is a very long dramatic statement piece that you can wear doubled or long like my flapper length designs.  This is a one of a kind piece and even if I ever get enough to make another, it will be a limited edition and still no two would ever be alike.

The primary colors also remind me of Alexander Calder and Piet Mondrian.  This necklace is both retro and very modern in style.



Measured along the entire longest loop.

48 inches long  (121.92 cm )
Buttons vary from 3/8 inch to 7/8 inch in width.  (.95 -  2.22 cm )



Your necklace will come to you carefully wrapped and packaged in a handmade fabric pouch fastened
with a vintage or antique button.




Handmade by Julia Creighton

© Copyright 2013
